properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,BOARD_TITLE ,MEMBER_ID ,COUNT ,B.REGI_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER=MEMBER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY ON (BOARD_CATEGORY = CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 3 ORDER BY B.REGI_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO > 9
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,MEMBER_ID ,B.REGI_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON (BOARD_CATEGORY = CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? ,BOARD_CONTENT = ? ,BOARD_CATEGORY = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND USE_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE Board SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT REPLY_NO ,CONTENT ,MEMBER_ID ,TO_CHAR(R.REGI_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FORMATTED_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (WRITER_NO = MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND R.USE_YN = 'Y'
